item.title: Cookies Notice
item.description:
Last Updated: August 10th, 2024

This Cookies Notice explains how RustyCruise Labs Pte. Ltd. (“we”, “us”, and “ours”) use cookies and similar technologies to supplement data about you when you visit our Website at rustycruiselabs.com. It explains what these technologies are and why we use them, as well as your rights to control our use of them.

WHAT ARE COOKIES OR SIMILAR TECHNOLOGIES?

Cookies and similar tracking technologies are used to track the activity on our service and can be used for storing certain information. Website owners use these tracking technologies for various reasons which can include enabling website to work efficiently, providing personalized content and advertising, and creating website analytics.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Last Updated: August 10th, 2024

SCOPE OF THIS POLICY

Thank you for playing our games and using our services! This Privacy Policy describes:

  • The ways we collect personal data about You
  • Why we collect Your personal data
  • How we use Your personal data
  • The choices You have about Your personal data

This Privacy Policy applies to all games, softwares, products, sites, and related services developed and offered by RustyCruise Labs Pte. Ltd. We use Your Personal data to provide and improve our Service. By using our Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

item.title: Terms of Service
item.description:
Last Updated: August 10th, 2024

WELCOME TO RUSTYCRUISE LABS

The terms of this agreement (“Terms”, “Terms of Service”, “Terms and Conditions”) governs the relationship between you and RustyCruise Labs Pte. Ltd. (hereinafter “RustyCruise” or “RustyCruise Labs” or “Us” or “We” or “Our”) regarding your use of RustyCruise Labs’s sites, softwares, games, applications, content, products, and related services (the “Service”). Use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy.

PLEASE READ THESE TERMS AND ANY SPECIFIC AND/OR SUPPLEMENTAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THE RUSTYCRUISE LABS SERVICES. THESE TERMS GOVERN YOUR USE OF THE RUSTYCRUISE LABS SERVICES IN GENERAL. BY USING THE RUSTYCRUISE LABS SERVICES YOU AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS AND ANY SPECIFIC AND/OR SUPPLEMENTAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS.
